embeds.title: üìù Staff Application üìù
embeds.description:
Thank you for your interest in joining our staff team! Please answer the following questions as thoroughly as possible:

1. **What is your age?** (Must be 18+)

2. **How long have you been in our community?**

3. **Do you have any previous moderation experience?** If yes, please provide details.

4. **Why do you want to become a staff member?**

5. **How many hours per week can you dedicate to the server?**

6. **What timezone are you in?**

7. **How would you handle a situation where two members are arguing in a channel?**

8. **What qualities do you think make a good moderator?**

Please take your time to answer these questions. Your application will be reviewed by our admin team as soon as possible.

footer.text: Dating Server Support ‚Ä¢ Thank you for your interest
